name: Rogue Party
description: Soul crushing bosses, epic loot and powerful magic await 1-4 Rogues foolish enough to take on the Dungeon of Doom.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Visa / 7 Processor: Direct X9.0 Compatible Card Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X9.0 Compatible Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: Yes
